Auto-apply rules will automatically tag messages when they match regex patterns. For example, pasting a Linear Issue link can automatically tag the project name and Issue ID without manual input.
自动应用规则在消息匹配正则模式时自动分配标签。
Auto-apply rules automatically assign tags when messages match regex patterns.
